get.description: Returns a list of all repositories. This includes plugin provided repositories

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
filter repositories by the repository key, only repositories of keys containing this value
 would be returned if value was provided.  Case insensitive.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description:
filter repositories by enabled flag.  Only enabled/disabled repositories would be returned
 accordingly if value was provided.

parameters.name: available
parameters.description:
filter repositories by its availability.  Only available/unavailable repositories would be returned
 accordingly if value was provided.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
filter repositories by type.  Allowed values: cvs, svn, p4, git, hg, plugin (for light SCM repositories).
 Parameter can be specified more than once.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: maximum number of repositories to be returned.

get.description: Represents a sorted list of changesets, newest first.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description:
only show change sets which contain at least one revision with a path under this path.
 Changesets with some revisions outside this path still include all revisions.
 i.e. Revisions outside the path are *not* excluded from the change set.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: the key of the Crucible SCM plugin repository.

parameters.name: oldestCsid
parameters.description: only return change sets after this change set. If omitted there is no restriction.

parameters.name: includeOldest
parameters.description: include the change set with id "from" in the change sets returned.

parameters.name: newestCsid
parameters.description: only return change sets before this change set. If omitted there is no restriction.

parameters.name: includeNewest
parameters.description: include the change set with id "to" in the change sets returned.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: return only the newest change sets, to a maximum of maxChangesets.
